title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with cancer starts making meth to secure his family's future.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Nine noble families wage war against each other while an ancient enemy rises again.

episodes.title: Winter Is Coming
episodes.description: Ned Stark is asked to serve as Hand of the King while a threat from beyond the Wall rises.
